entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 01 January 2023
